user.title: SaveEcoBot
user.description: Type in **Search** to filter cities, then pick a city. To find station IDs, open [SaveEcoBot map]({map_link}) and click a point â€” check `device_xxxxx` at the end of the URL.

stations.title: SaveEcoBot stations
stations.description: Select stations to create sensors. Tip: open [SaveEcoBot map]({map_link}) and look for `device_xxxxx` in the URL.
